attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They are horrible and disgusting and the wearing of sandals should be banned in all public places. This should extend also to flip-flops and any shoes with open toes.

Particularly they should be banned during any month with an 'r' in it. Even last week, when it was still April, we had a bit of sun and they couldn't wait to get them out. 20 years ago hardly anyone wore them. It was no hotter really and yet everyone seemed to manage.

Even during the summer months, they should be banned from at least some places so we have a nice safe haven to go where there won't be any.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
